{"name":"YEP_X_CriticalControl","status":true,"description":"v1.06 (Requires YEP_DamageCore.js) Control over critical\nhits have been added.","parameters":{"Critical Rate Formula":"rate = user.cri * (1 - target.cev);","Critical Multplier Formula":"value *= 2.0 + bonus;","Flat Critical Formula":"value += ((baseDamage >= 0) ? 1 : -1) * 1.5 * user.luk + bonus;"}}
